arm.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: one of the two long parts of your body between your shoulders and your hands

arm.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: the part of a chair, sofa etc that you rest your arms on
arm.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: the part of a piece of clothing that covers your arm
arm.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a part of a large group that is responsible for a particular type of activity

arm.translation[0].definitions[4].defini: a long part of an object or piece of equipment
